# generated by cmake-generator
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.16.3)

add_library(steam-api STATIC steam.c)

include(Tornado.cmake)
set_tornado(steam-api)

if(COMPILER_CLANG)
  target_compile_options(steam-api PRIVATE -Wno-cast-function-type-strict)
endif()

target_include_directories(steam-api PUBLIC ../include)

target_link_libraries(steam-api PUBLIC atheneum)
